metadata.Title: CVE-2013-4221 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: The default configuration of the ObjectRepresentation class in Restletbefore 2.1.4 deserializes objects from untrusted sources using the JavaXMLDecoder, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary Java codevia crafted XML.

criterions.comment: restlet: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
